display_name: Apnea-Hypopnea Index (Supine): (Apneas with >= 2% oxygen desaturation threshold used and with or without arousal+ hypopneas with > 50% flow reduction and with >= 2% oxygen desaturation used and with or without arousal) / hour of sleep in supine from type I polysomnography
description: [(total number of apneas and hypopneas in supine body position associated with >= 2% desaturation) / (hours of sleep)]
calculation: 60*(hrembp2 + hnrbp2 + carbp2 + canbp2 + oarbp2 + oanbp2 + marbp2 + manrbp2)/(remepbp+nremepbp)
